description: This table contains blood special requirements in the Patient Order Template (OTP) record.

columns.name: OTP_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the patient order template record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: BLOOD_SPEC_REQTS_C_NAME
columns.description:
List of special requirements for the blood order.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Irradiated


CMV Negative


Leukoreduced


Sickle Cell (Hgb S) Negative


Concentrate


HLA Match


Solid-Phase Red-Cell Adherence


PLA-1 Negative


Cryoreduced


Washed


PAS


Plasma Compatible
